Body:
p = Pipeline([('a', SomeStep()), ('b', SomeStep()), ('c', SomeStep())])
p.set_hyperparams({'a__learning_rate': 7, 'a__other_hp': 8})
p.update_hyperparams({'a__learning_rate': 0.01})
assert p['a'].hyperparams['learning_rate'] == 0.01
assert p['a'].hyperparams['other_hp'] == 8
assert p['b'].hyperparams == dict()
assert p['c'].hyperparams == dict()
